doc:
Lance Reddick https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lance_Reddick 0 Lance Reddick (born December 31, 1962) is an American actor and musician. He is best known for playing Cedric Daniels in The Wire and Phillip Broyles in Fringe. He is also known for portraying Detective Johnny Basil on Oz and Matthew Abaddon in Lost. Additionally, he provided both the voice and likeness for video game characters Martin Hatch in Quantum Break, Sylens in Horizon Zero Dawn and Commander Zavala in the Destiny franchise. Lance_Reddick ( born December_31_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor_and_musician . He is_best_known for playing Cedric_Daniels in The_Wire and Phillip_Broyles in Fringe . He is_also_known for portraying Detective_Johnny_Basil on Oz and Matthew_Abaddon in Lost . Additionally , he provided both the_voice_and_likeness for video_game_characters_Martin_Hatch in Quantum_Break , Sylens in Horizon_Zero_Dawn and Commander_Zavala in the_Destiny_franchise .
